document_data.name: Mardamaun
document_data.mainbody: '''Mardamaun''' was one of the [[Nimbral Lords]]. He was a taciturn and deep-thinking figure and one of the leading Elders.{{Cite web/Realmslore/The Realm of Nimbral, Part Eight: The Nimbral Lords}}
